display.name: Awakening the Devourer
display.description: The one who has carried the burden of the Herald for so long has finally achieved the appearance of his master. The cosmos holds its breath. He is coming

description.translate: For 7 days, be a Silver Surfer. Only a true Herald can summon Galactus    (Wear a Silver Surfer costume for 2 hours and 20 minutes)
